responsibilities: Develop concepts by studying relevant information and materials

responsibilities: Maintain accurate daily accounts and perform timely bank reconciliations
Manage company assets with precise asset accounting records
Control debts and balances with customers and vendors
Record all financial data in the accounting system
Prepare and deliver timely financial reports
requirements: 2 years in accounting or finance roles
Proficiency in accounting software such as QuickBooks or ERP systems
Strong knowledge of IFRS and local tax regulations
extraDetails.education: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
skills: High attention to detail and accuracy
extraDetails.application: Send your CV to CyberKingV@gmail.com and mention Accounting Officer in your email

extraDetails.rolePurpose: Support day-to-day finance operations, maintain accurate accounting records, and ensure compliance with tax laws and reporting standards in Iraq and the Kurdistan Region.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting (mandatory)
Kurdish nationality; fluency in Kurdish & Arabic (English is a plus)
3+ years of experience in accounting, bookkeeping, and financial reporting
Strong knowledge of local tax laws and accounting standards
High attention to detail, organization, and problem-solving
Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
Male candidates only (role-specific requirement)
benefits: $1,000 – $1,300 USD / month (competitive package based on experience)
extraDetails.application: Send your CV to careers@sarinaz.co with subject: Senior Accountant

requirements: مانتۆری خۆی هەبیت و کێشەی نەبیت (must have own vehicle, no issues)
